name: Battle Robots
description:
Do you like fast games with the grinding of metal? Try to take part in fights with robots. Your task is to come out of the battle victorious, deftly inflicting crushing blows on your opponent. Upgrade your armor, and then head to the arena to fight. Start playing now!

A robot combat simulator where you communicate as the manager of one of them. Your task is to earn money, to pump up your robot, to become the best in this fast-growing business.
In the game you will need to buy robots, improve them and participate in battles. Control is done with the mouse.

Features:

- pleasant graphics;
- simple control;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
